artist: Engraver: Oliviero Gotti; after Giovanni Antonio Licinio
inscription:
Inscription

in plate in black left of image:[ Il Pordenone/Inuent et Pinse/ nella Chiesa/ desta Maria di Campa/ in Piacenza]; in plate right of image: [Oliviero Gotti/ piacentino/ fece/ MDCXXVI]; on sheet in pencil: [1-655/ see Licinio]; on mount in pencil: [ Oliviero Gotti 1579 -after 1628 (act. 1602-28 Bologna)/ b. Piacenza]
title: Il Pordenone
